mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, user_point, user_phone, user_addr1, user_addr2, user_addr3) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_point} ,#{user_phone}, #{user_addr1}, #{user_addr2}, #{user_addr3})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set user_addr1 = #{user_addr1}, user_addr2 = #{user_addr2}, user_addr3 = #{user_addr3}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_email = #{user_email} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select o.*, d.* from tbl_order o, tbl_order_state_category d where user_id = #{user_id} and o.order_state = d.order_state order by order_date desc

select p.*, d.order_state_dsc from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select o.* from tbl_order o where user_id = #{user_id}) a) p, tbl_order_state_category d where p.order_state = d.order_state and rnum between 1 and 3 order by p.rnum desc
select p.*, c.*, rownum rnum from tbl_point p, tbl_point_category c where p.point_category = c.point_category and user_id = #{user_id} order by rnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_point(point_no, user_id, point_score, point_category) values(SEQ_POINT_NO.nextval, #{user_id}, #{point_score}, #{point_category})
